thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 11 de 669
thread.title: Antanina

author: Antanina
title: Antanina
text: Very Bad customer service (Barcelona airport terminal 1), couldn't explain even what's happened till I came second time and then they explained that they are making over bookings. That's why my booking are canceled, but money are charged from account. They didn't notice about cancelation till I came to pick up car. Do not believe what they say online, that car will be guaranteed. That is not true.
